comment: Used to love it. Now you can't separate just winter from Christmas. Annoying. And worse… now at least 50% of the pages are annoying ads. The ads are so distracting, it's nearly impossible to concentrate on what you're searching for. I just gave up. If it isn't fixed soon, I'll uninstall and look elsewhere.

author: Minjeong Kim
comment: This app is great. It connects with other live wallpaper apps which is really convenient. The only reason why I gave it a four is because you can't pick between lock screen or home screen when setting the wallpaper.

author: saathiyaana artxtra
comment: So common.. Nothing So Special!!

author: rachelnm05 love
comment: I love cool wallpaper

author: Carolina Felisoni
comment: Kit the 🐈 cat ha ha ha
Great app always looking for pics thumbs up for this app

author: Harsh Deshpande
comment: It's amazing

? What's up guys? Love cool wallpapers, only tried to save some in gallery to so I might change it without obnoxious ads. Next thing you know you're trying to charge me for supposed free wallpapers. I understand ads are you're sponsors and since I was bombarded w them with sure I'll remember them. Got into artists that created cool work but when T mobile told me btr check the bill it oh. Not trying to break copyright infringement simply wanted to show friend so they might b interested. Look I'm disabled, don't have a life and am poor. Bye bye.

author: Carmen Patata Anaranjada
comment: Removing this app after having it over 5 years on various phones. The amount of ads is discusting. As the content that is on them which is forced on my eyes. Shame on you.

author: Zeynep Avan
comment: sometimes it doesn't work.so that it's getting bored.

author: Hexa -
comment: Best one i tried yet. Good quality wallpapers and setting a wp actually works like it should on my tablet. 5/5

author: Shekh Riaz
comment: youre talant nice

author: Linda Gunawan
comment: I can't download pictures. I rarely can download it. From 10 pictures maybe only 1 that could be downloaded. I dont know why. I have good connection. Its said failuring download images becuz of lost connection or try again later. Always said that. Get pissed

author: Bogdan Maxim
comment: The best wallpapers. It finally works on my phone as well after a half of year of waiting for an update to fix the download issues...

author: Jessie Jessie
comment: Apps stopped when trying to save as wallpaper.

author: Beth Mylastname
comment: SO MANY ads!  Poor search results.  Uninstalling.

author: RUPANKAR CHATTOPADHYAY
comment: Nice 1

I used to like this on another phone platform. Now I downloaded it here and wow! What is with the ad every 5 secs? I mean very annoying and no option to shut them off. Why the aggressive advertising? 1 star for now. Fix this and I'll give you five stars.

author: Dave Beaudoin
comment: Was a great app until they got greedy with full page video ads plus the amount of ads

author: Ryan H
comment: Beyond a shadow of any doubt, this is THE best app if you're looking for seemless, high quality, eye melting wallpapers for your phone. Just trust me on this- I've tried several high rated wallpaper apps, and they pale in comparison. You'll have to watch a short ad periodically but it's well worth it.

author: No Name
comment: To this day I still can't find a wallpaper app to match selection and quality of Cool Wallpapers. Most apps claim 4k HD quality while either falling short on selection or horrible pixel density. Aside from the necessary evil in ads, this app has no competition.

I tried just about all the wall papers in the play store and  this one came out on top of all of them I tried , I Love how you can set as home or lock screen as your wall paper. High quality HD pictures with tons to choose from and easy to use . Its light on storage   and doesn't ask for a lot of permissions and it's totally free! I would download it today if I were you! Note: ads have been toned down also. Best lock and home screen wall papers in the play store PERIOD! Devs please don't get rid of the wall papers you already have because they are the best!😎

author: Ruth Bowker
comment: I have used this app for years and it's been great. All of a sudden there are adverts every 20 seconds which stops you looking at the pictures and it is now not allowing me to download the pictures to my gallery. I have uninstalled and reinstalled to no avail.

author: Matthew Garner
comment: Excellent wallpapers, yet many will not download due to the app needing to constantly load an ad every twenty seconds. Even on our 60mbps home internet connection, just constant errors trying to load images or download. I'm disappointed I had to uninstall.

author: John Farley
comment: I have this app on my Samsung Chromebook Pro, and it works like a charm. The HD quality wallpapers automatically optimize themselves for my 12 inch Chromebook screen, without adjustment. I haven't tried it for phone and tablet, since I don't have an Android phone or tablet, but for my Android-enabled Chromebook, this works great!

author: Barbara DeLaye
comment: I guess you you updated this app because it was great before. Now it stinks. When I try to download the new pics, I am told no Internet connection or try again later. I have already seen the popular 100 times. I used to download popular or new with no problem. I think you fixed something that was not broke.

author: Elizabeth Woodcock
comment: Your ads are OBNOXIOUSand they happen after every 5 clicks. I will stop using your app IMMEDIATELY. Horrible, horrible user experience!

author: K sc
comment: Full Size ads very frequently forced ads. 15 sec Video. Not only this after exiting this app. Full size ads popping up on play store oen page. So aggressively into ads. Shame

author: Lisa Bevans
comment: Greed run rampant, with an ad every 12 seconds and forced video ads.  People take this as a given . . . But it isn't.  I would rather pay a fee to buy the app.  Also, not sure why, but all pictures are close-ups.  I am looking for pictures that stimulate the imagination.  The pictures, however, seem to be good quality.  Uninstalling.

author: Robert Brisson
comment: Really? A 15-30 second ad every time you look at a different wallpaper? I looked at 3 wallpapers and it took me a minute and a half! Unacceptable. Uninstalling!!!

author: Michael Perfeito
comment: The ads can be a bit intrusive and excessive. The UI also looks and feels very dated. Overall this app feels like an app that was designed when Android first came out.

author: Srini Venkat
comment: It's very good as a wallpaper app. But the app has now started playing ads with sound inside the app. This is very irritating and annoying - and frankly intrusive when I am in a quiet environment. If you play a video with sound, give controls to mute it. Even better, start muted, with option to switch on sound. If you don't change this soon, I will uninstall the app, sorry. The value you add is not worth the intrusion into my personal space.

author: Carolyn Lagarde
comment: It was great at first, my fave. Until I could no longer download & change wallpapers, because stupid Google ads are right in the way of the select button. 😬 Completely unusable, had to uninstall unfortunately.

author: Kathy Smith
comment: Used to LOVE this app. But for the past few days it cannot download more than one wallpaper, IF I'm lucky. Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

author: real silverjunk
comment: Great app but you need to stop those loud video ads. Even when the phone is on silent they scream and closing the app is the only way to stop it. Stick with soundless ads or people will start uninstalling.

author: Duane Gettings
comment: Nice pictures, but be warned, VERY INVASINE and constant flashing advertisements.  Possibly the worst on any wallpaper app!

author: Manuel Fonseca
comment: It's really not good at all. First problem is that all images are squares with weird resolution; second problem is that the images themselves are very bad... Not worth even browsing as millions of adds come pouring.

It's a very very sincere request to all those out thr looking for a pleasingly excellent hd walpaper app to get installed this one. It's worth a million installation.....i have literally installed thousands of walpaper app prior to this....absolutely none stand's even at the lowest level in comparison to this.....i give it 10 stars....

author: spade velv
comment: Amazing photos  But a few are repetitive and also there is no option to set the photos as a home screen photo or a lock screen one. Plz consider that option in your future updates.

author: Kami Fleming
comment: Perfect This game is seriously awesome and beautiful. The app is very easy to use after a while and the pictures are amazing. I cant BELIEVE how many pictures there are! This is the best app i have ever got.
